overview: The Lambert family purchased a new telephone in 1909. Eighty years later and after the recent passing of Tim Lambert's father, he moves in with his widowed mother and discovers a special family heirloom. It is the obsolete telephone which still seems capable of doing one thing. The past is dialing Tim for information - or is it help?
tagline: The past is dialing Tim for information... or is it help?
title: Hello Are You There?
